content:
The webpage you give states:

Contributors must submit their papers using the Easychair system Submissions should not exceed 12 pages in Springer LNCS format including references.

Symposium proceedings will be published in the “Lecture Notes in Computer Science” (LNCS) series of Springer.
author: CAO Yixin

content: Thanks for spotting this inconsistency! I am not involved in the organization of this event, but I have informed Magnús and his team. The web page will be updated soon. The organizers told me that the correct information is the one in the CFP I posted and that is being distributed on several mailing lists.
author: Luca Aceto
